definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: At the mean time, the vulture went by. The potion was polluted by the unexpectedly fallen hair.
sentences.chinese: 同时，秃鹰正巧经过，秃鹰的头发无意间落入魔药内。

sentences.english: Unintentionally Zhang Jie from the radio to hear that the first "after tomorrow."
sentences.chinese: 无意间从收音机里听到张杰的那首《明天过后》。

sentences.english: It's a good tool for casually getting to know people.
sentences.chinese: 是人们无意间彼此认识的一个好方法。

sentences.english: Heathcliff overhears and runs away from Wuthering Heights. Ch 9
sentences.chinese: 希斯克里夫无意间听到，于是从呼啸山庄离家出走。

sentences.english: Grace accidentally met, thick, thick is piano celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 素恩无意间遇见瑞厚，没想到瑞厚是钢琴名人。

sentences.english: But a little wind was accidentally discovered autumn sakura learn really my character.
sentences.chinese: 不过一次无意间被小风发现秋樱学的真我性格。

sentences.english: Those cultures can be built consciously or evolve inadvertently.
sentences.chinese: 这些文化可能是有意或无意间建立的。

sentences.english: I came across this old picture of you when I was looking for some documents.
sentences.chinese: 当我找文件的时候，我无意间找到了你的这张老照片。

sentences.english: It was here that young Actaeon accidentally came and suffered cruel treatment at the hands of the goddess.
sentences.chinese: 而当阿卡同无意间来到这里时，却遭到了女神的虐待。

sentences.english: He ran into Davis in Paris yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天在巴黎无意间碰上了戴维斯。

sentences.english: I saw someone planting trees by chance.
sentences.chinese: 我们无意间看到一些人在栽树。

sentences.english: You might offend people without meaning to.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会无意间开罪人。

sentences.english: I happened to grow the toad skin melons in summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏天我无意间种出了癞皮瓜。

sentences.english: Wang reveals the cards in his hands unconsciously.
sentences.chinese: 王主任无意间透露了底牌。

sentences.english: I ran across a letter you wrote to me when we were children.
sentences.chinese: 我无意间找到了一封你写的信，那时我们都不大。

sentences.english: Allison came upon the findings by accident.
sentences.chinese: 研究结论是阿里森无意间得到的。

definition: just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
inadvertent/accidental/to have no intention of (doing sth)
at leisure/idle/to have nothing to do
suddenly have a thought (idiom)/suddenly be inspired to do something
as it turns out/by lucky coincidence/(of number, time, size etc) just right
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
